sentences.en: A usually fatal epidemic disease, especially bubonic plague.
sentences.cn: 兔子患染的一种病毒性疾病.

sentences.en: Bubonic plague is an extremely dangerous pathogen.
sentences.cn: 淋巴腺鼠疫是极危险的病原体.

sentences.en: Carried by fleas from rodents to humans, bubonic plague cannot pass from human to human.
sentences.cn: 携带经由跳蚤从啮齿动物到人类, 腺鼠疫不能通过人传人.

sentences.en: Carson Wells : Compared to what? bubonic plague?
sentences.cn: 卡森·韦尔斯: 那得看跟什麽比? 黑死病?

sentences.en: Carson Wells : Compared to what? The bubonic plague?
sentences.cn: 卡森·韦尔斯: 那得看跟什么比? 黑死病?

sentences.en: It was a kind of cesspit constantly seething with smallpox and bubonic plague.
sentences.cn: 那里,几乎可以说曾经是天花和黑死病生生不息的污水坑.

sentences.en: Pneumonic plague is caused by the same bacterium that occurs in bubonic plague.
sentences.cn: 肺鼠疫同样是由出现在黑死病中的的细菌引起的.

sentences.en: Results Bubonic plague colloid gold is one kind sensitive, special, the fast examination bubonic plague method.
sentences.cn: 结果鼠疫胶体金是一种敏感 、 特异 、 快速检测鼠疫的方法.

sentences.en: The bubonic plague swept off most of the villagers.
sentences.cn: 那场淋巴腺鼠疫夺去了大部分村民的生命.

sentences.en: The lung disease is caused by the same bacterium as bubonic plague.
sentences.cn: 这种肺病与黑死病一样,是由同一种杆菌引起的.

sentences.en: The planes were accused of spreading cholera, typhus, and bubonic plague.
sentences.cn: 有人指责那些飞机传播了霍乱 、 斑疹伤寒和黑死病.

sentences.en: There are three main forms of plague in humans, namely bubonic, septicaemic and pneumonic.
sentences.cn: 人间鼠疫主要有三种类型:腹股沟腺炎型 、 败血症型和肺型.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the fleas on those rats carried a disease called Bubonic Plague.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 那些老鼠身上的跳蚤携带着一种被称为“黑死病”的疾病.

words.tran_cn: [内科] 腹股沟淋巴结炎；腹股沟腺炎

trans.tran_cn: （指鼠疫）腹股沟淋巴结炎的，腺鼠疫
